name: unidmex
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))

stmt.origin: 3syl(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cdm(c1), universe))
stmt.pretty: 3syl(w0, ⋃ dom(c1)∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c2, dom(c1)∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cdm(c1), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c1), universe), wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cdm(c1), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c1), universe), wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(cdm(c1), universe), wcel(cuni(cdm(c1)), universe))

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: If ` F ` is a set, then ` U. dom F ` is a set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
